Events
======

.. note::
    Some event listeners are attached within functions that add elements to the DOM.

.. autofunction:: settings.event.accountCancelMobile

.. autofunction:: settings.event.badgeConfigMenuCancel

.. autofunction:: settings.event.badgeConfigMenuEscape

.. autofunction:: settings.event.badgeConfigMenuSave

.. autofunction:: settings.event.badgeConfigToggle

.. autofunction:: settings.event.confirmPassVisToggle

.. autofunction:: settings.event.notificationsCancelMobile

.. autofunction:: settings.event.passVisToggle

.. autofunction:: settings.event.profileCancelMobile

.. autofunction:: settings.event.sectionClick
